website_summaries.verdict: A premium sunscreen that doubles as a moisturizer and can be used on the face and body.
pros: Has a silky smooth consistency that feels lightweight on the skin and is very hydrating
It only takes a few drops for excellent coverage
Wears as long as 12 hours per application
cons: Tends to get clumpy if you apply makeup over top of it

customer_reviews.title: Pricey with a low spf and not a great formula
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear Elta MD sunscreen SPF 45, but I was intrigued by the "blurring effect". The first things I noticed is It is hard to spread all over the face. Second, if you are planning to put on foundation after, the sunscreen will cause pilling and add to the appearance of texture. Third, it is heavily scented. I do not appreciate high end products that contain perfume as I have sensitive skin. Overall, not worth it for me as a makeup wearer. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite and most used skincare products!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic as a primer under foundation or as sunscreen on a “naked” face! It feels silky and truly blurs imperfections and generally evens out my skin tones. LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: Great product. One small drop goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My sister swears by this and I decided to give this a try. Oh my! It's amazing! You only need one small pump for it to apply throughout the whole face too! This will last a long time and defintely will reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Moisturizer--Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer but I am often frustrated by the lack of quality control in their packaging. Almost every other time I buy it the pump doesn't work because the tube to the pump mechanism is missing. My latest bottle works--yea!! If it wasn't such a wonderful product I would have stopped buying it long ago because I hate returning things.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Costlow

customer_reviews.title: Must Have. Feels like buttah!
customer_reviews.text: I can't put on a drop of makeup without my primer. this primer contains sunscreen and make skin feel smooth all over. I have some dry patches and it relieves the texture of my skin for when I apply foundation. love this stuff. a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: cindy weiss

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer. There is a matte finish so even if you don’t wear make up you have a more finished look on your skin. And I love the fact that it has a sun protection factor. I won’t wear a moisturizer without at least a spf of 15
customer_reviews.author: Carol B Mello

customer_reviews.title: Great primer with line blurring results
customer_reviews.text: Murad Invisiblur Perfecting Shield does in fact blur lines and is an excellent very lightweight primer for my foundation. Sometimes I don't wear foundation because it does that great of a job. I do not yet know of the strength of its SPF claims but will know upon getting a scan at my dermatologist. I have been using the product for the past5 months and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Easy to apply, really works to protect skin from the sun and I can see when the container is running low.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Kawaja

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Good sunscreen, nice scent, & feels good on skin. I use daily. Much nicer than other commercial products of this type!
customer_reviews.author: Sheilia R Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Makes your skin feel buttery smooth smells good definitely blurs very well. Excellent primer
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: The best daytime facial lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Extra great for oily skin. Goes on smoothly and light! Also provides sun protection! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: ITS LIKE SOFT SILK ON YOUR SKIN. MY FOUNDATION GLIDES ON. LOVE IT !!
customer_reviews.author: Judie Laudahl

customer_reviews.title: Light Silky Finish bro a Morning Routine
customer_reviews.text: This product is the perfect finish to my daily routine. It provides a light, silky coating to my face that allows makeup to adhere to my skin and appear natural and invisible. I have been using this product for more than a year and highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silky UV protection for your face!
customer_reviews.text: Love the silkiness of this product along with UV protection. Goes on smooth and Face looks great without makeup too!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Garner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen, the only one I use. Goes on matte. Smells nice but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Helps to decrease lines
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and feel it is helpful with decreasing lines especially around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Trumm

customer_reviews.title: Blur the lines and uneven tones too👍
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to for quick primer easy to apply on face. Fantastic !
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Wear this with a mask for protection and a beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually like gel sunscreens or primers, but this brand is excellent. It goes on smoothly, is absorbed by the skin, and creates a mat finish. There is no greasiness in the primer/ sunscreen at all! In the Age of Covid and wearing masks, I’m using tinted moisturizer on my forehead and this sunscreen and primer for the rest of my face. This is so that I don’t leave tinted creams on my masks.
customer_reviews.author: Many frogs kissed

customer_reviews.title: This stuff saved my face
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I asked a friend of mine what she used to protect her skin while on location, she recommended Invisablur. After six weeks my skin evened out and fine lines were dulled, leaving me happy. I recently told my mom about it and now she too is in love. It feels like rose petals being brushed up against your face when you apply it. In the mornings I follow it with powder and mascara. But in full makeup it holds its own as a fabulous primer that keeps your makeup stay fresh all day/night.
customer_reviews.author: shuggabawlz

customer_reviews.title: One of the best primers I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of primers at a lot of different price points, and this one may be my favorite. (Hourglass is a close contender.) Makeup looks perfect, all day. I've never touched up with it mid-day like they recommend, but I primarily use it for its priming qualities with sun protection as an added bonus, as opposed to the other way around.
customer_reviews.author: CleverUsername

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The best sunscreen for your face on the planet. I’ve been using this religiously for years. This Texas sun is no joke! Not heavy. Works super well with make up application. The sheerness is like silk sheets. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Monica H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect under a mask
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I wanted a skin perfector with sunscreen so my skin looks nice and blurred without makeup. I got tired of my makeup and tinted sunscreen rubbing off on my mask and having to wash it daily. So now I’m a happy masker! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Invisiblur - one step readiness
customer_reviews.text: I wear this daily - it provides sun protection and keeps my skin hydrated. No foundation needed anymore- this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing product!! SUPER Light, transparent and doesn't make your face sticky... my skin is so sensitive, for that, I've tried so many sunscreens and I always had a problem using one because of the texture, the color of it and the after effect.. This one did not cause any allergic reaction, did not cause any pimples, and did not look greasy on my face. I honestly cannot say enough about it, I'm in love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timi
